Frequently Asked Questions

How can I register for an event?

You can register directly through our events page by clicking the 'Register' button on any specific event card.

Do you offer group discounts?

Yes, for teams larger than 5 people, we offer a 20% discount on all workshops and conferences.

Where are your offices located?

We have a main hub in Zurich and satellite offices in London and New York. All locations are open for visits.
